dc:title: On Pilgrimage - November 1965
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tales of her travel to Rome to join twenty women on a ten-day fast for peace at Vatican Council II. Shares vignettes of friends, clergy, meetings, books, prayers, Masses, and accommodations. Describes the pain that accompanied her fast.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 835 1965-11-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
